SECTION TWO / 20 Questions
Indicate how often each statement is true for you: Never RARELY SOMETIMES USUALLY ALWAYS
Being around lots of people energizes me
I am full of new ideas
I make sure other people know that I care about their feelings
I prefer to follow a schedule
People tell me I am too quiet
I have a vivid imagination
It’s important to me to make decisions without being swayed by emotions
I’d rather go with the flow than have a set schedule
I enjoy chatting with new acquaintances
I like to do things differently, even if I’m not sure it will work
I think of myself as a sensitive
I make plans and stick to them
